name: iTweaksUninstaller
tagline: A simple application writter in VB.NET to uninstall all tweaks in one time.
body:
# iTweaksUninstaller

![Screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sn0wCooder/Icons/master/iTweaksUninstaller_1.0.PNG)

Hello there! I'm **iTweaksUninstaller**,  the open source application made for Windows users, by *[Leonardo Alfreducci](http://github.com/Sn0wCooder)*, to simple uninstall all tweaks in once time on your jailbroken iOS device.

I recommend to install **safestart** and **NO PLS RECOVERY ** *(optional)* from *[angelXwind Repository](http://cydia.angelxwind.net)*, because if your device still in boot loop, you can simple remove all tweaks on it with this application. After you can use *[Putty](http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/download.html)* to run command `killall sshd` command.

Problem? *[Contact me](mailto:leoalfreducci@gmail.com)*!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
